Package game.actions

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    An Action to attack another Actor.
    ConsumeAction
    An Action to consume an item.
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    Action where an actor despawns from the game map.
    DropRunesAction
    The DropRunesAction class is responsible for dropping runes when a player dies in the game.
    ExchangeAction
    ExchangeAction is an action performed by an actor to exchange weapons with Finger Reader Enia.
    HealAction
    This class represents an action that allows an actor to heal themselves when using the Flask of Crimson Tears item.
    PickUpRunesAction
    Represents the action of a player picking up runes from a location on the game map.
    PoisonAction
    PoisonAction is an action performed on an actor to apply poison damage.
    RangedAttackAction
    An action representing a ranged attack by an actor using a weapon.
    RespawnAction
    Allows an Actor to respawn at the Site of Lost Grace when the player dies and needs to respawn.
    RestAction
    Represents an action for an actor to rest at a Site of Lost Grace, allowing for a full reset of the game state.
    ReviveSkeletonEnemyAction
    Action to revive a dead skeleton enemy actor on the game map.
    SpawnPileOfBonesAction
    An action that spawns a PileOfBones on the map in the place of a defeated skeleton enemy.
    SummonAction
    An action representing the summoning of an ally or invader by an actor.
    TradeAction
    Represents a TradeAction that allows the Actor to buy or sell weapons with Merchant Kale.
    TravelAction
    An action that represents traveling to a different location on the game map.
